CONTRASENIAS_NO_COINCIDEN: The password confirmation doesn't match the new password
DONACION_EXCEDE_PRESUPUESTO: Total donation amount exceeds the budget.
EFECTIVIDAD_CONCEPTO: The effectiveness is the relationship between performance and the proposed outcome.
EFICACIA_CONCEPTO: The Effectiveness Over Time is the extent to which the targets are met, in a certain period of time, regardless of the cost implication.
EFICIENCIA_CONCEPTO: The economic efficiency as we understand the relationship between costs and results.
EMPLEADO_YA_EXISTE: An employee with the same identification already exists.
EMPRESA_CARGO_ERROR_CAMPOS_VACIOS: Name, area and profile are mandatory.
EMPRESA_DOCUMENTO_ERROR_CAMPOS_VACIOS: Title, summary, keywords and a file are mandatory.
EMPRESA_EMPLEADO_ERROR_CAMPOS_VACIOS: Name, last name and identification are mandatory.
EMPRESA_GENERAL_ERROR_CAMPOS_VACIOS: Name, address, identification and country are mandatory.
ERROR_ARCHIVO_ACTIVIDAD_INVALIDA: No Activity type found with the code:
ERROR_ARCHIVO_COLUMNA_FECHA_INVALIDA: Date is not valid. Date format must be yyyy/mm/dd or yyyy/mm/dd hh:mm, example: 2015/06/28 17:10.
ERROR_ARCHIVO_COLUMNA_FECHA_MOVIMIENTO_I: Date is not valid. Date format must be yyyy/mm/dd, example: 2015/06/28.
ERROR_ARCHIVO_COLUMNA_HORA_INVALIDA: Time is not valid. Time format must be hh:mm, example: 17:10.
ERROR_ARCHIVO_MONEDA_INVALIDA: No Currency found with the name:
ERROR_ARCHIVO_NUMERO_INVALIDO: Value is not a valid number.
ERROR_ARCHIVO_PARTIDA_GASTO_INVALIDO: No Expenditure Item found with the name:
ERROR_ARCHIVO_PERIODO_INVALIDO: No Period found with the name:
ERROR_ARCHIVO_TIPO_MOVIMIENTO_INVALIDO: No Movement type found with the name:
ERROR_FECHAINICIO_FECHAFIN_INVALIDAS: Start date must be less than End date
ERROR_FORMULA_DEBE_VALIDARSE: Formula should be validated before exit.
ERROR_GUARDADO: Critical error, the record has not be saved
ERROR_INESPERADO_IMPORTANDO_LOG: Unexpected error importing the file, please load the file again.
ERROR_INESPERADO_IMPORTANDO_MOVIMIENTO: Unexpected error importing the file, please load the file again.
ERROR_INFORME_METAS_INVALIDAS: Goal Budget and Goal Progress must be greater than 0.
ERROR_MONTO_REQUERIDO: Amount is mandatory and must be greater than 0.
ERROR_PONDERADO_INVALIDO: Weighted must be a valid value greater than or equals to 0
ERROR_RECURSOS_SOBREPASA_PRESUPUESTO: Resource Program contribution exceeds the budget.
ERROR_UBICACION_VACIA: Location is mandatory. Please search a location in the map and click on search button to stablish the location.
ERROR_VARIABLE_YA_EXISTE: A variable with the same name already exists in the formula
FINISH_ENCUESTA_CONFIRMACION: Are you sure you want to finish the inquiry? This shall not be modified.
FORMULA_CORRECTA: Formula validated, close the window to continue
IMPORT_LOG_ARCHIVO_VALIDO: File has been validated. Please click on Ok button to continue import process. Number of records to be imported:
IMPORT_LOG_ERROR: File has not been loaded because the file is not valid o the file is empty.
IMPORT_MOVIMIENTO_ARCHIVO_VALIDO: File has been validated. Please click on Ok button to continue import process. Number of records to be imported:
INDICADOR_ERROR_CAMPOS_VACIOS: Following data is required: Description, Definition, Target, Attributes, Coverage, Start date, End date, Base, Goal, Measurement unit, Operating Unit.
INDICADOR_ERROR_META_BASE_INVALID: Base and Goal must be a value greater than 0.
MENSAJE_ENCUESTA_BLOQUEADA: Inquiry has been locked successfully!!. This shall not be modified.
MENSAJE_ENCUESTA_FINISHED: Inquiry has been finished successfully!!. This shall not be modified.
MOVIMIENTO_ERROR_APORTE_MONEDA_LOCAL_INV: Program contribution - local currency, must be a valid number.
MOVIMIENTO_ERROR_MONTO_REQUERIDO: Amount is mandatory and must be greater than 0. To calculate it, please enter a valid Counterpart and / or Program contribution.
MOVIMIENTO_ERROR_OBSERVACIONES_REQUERIDA: Observations are required and must contain at least 5 characters.
MOVIMIENTO_ERROR_PRESUPUESTO_NO_ENCONTRA: Critical error to get the budget configuration. Please contact your system administrator.
MOVIMIENTO_ERROR_PRODUCTO_REQUERIDO: Product, Activity and Beneficiary are mandatory.
NIVEL_ACEPTACION_LABEL: Outcome according to expected project percentage. Very Satisfactory, Satisfactory, Unsatisfactory, Very Unsatisfactory.
NO_MENSAJES: Oops!! You don't have any message yet
NO_TAREAS: You don't have any assigned task
ORDEN_ERROR_MAXIMO_DETALLE: A smaller value can be used to insert the question in a specific position.
PEDIR_PERMISO: or Ask permission to the system administrator
PROYECTO_ERROR_CAMPOS_PROBLEMA_VACIOS: Following data is required: Problem, Problem Description and Rationale.
PROYECTO_ERROR_CAMPOS_VACIOS: Following data is required: Code, Name, Company, Project Manager, Data Entry Operator, Evaluator, Area, Region, Beneficiary, Start and End Date.
PROYECTO_ERROR_NIVELES_ACEPTACION: Acceptance Level must be greater than 0 and lower than 100.
PROYECTO_NIVELES_ACEPTACION_INCONSISTENT: Acceptance values are inconsistent. Higher satisfaction values must be greater than lower levels.
REGRESAR_DASHBOARD: You can return to the dashboard
RESPONSABLE_YA_ASIGNADO: Responsible already asigned to other area.
SELECCIONAR_ARCHIVO: You must select a .csv file. Import file should contain only two columns: Date and Comment. Date format must be yyyy/mm/dd hh:mm, example: 2015/06/28 17:10. If time is not defined, 00:00 will be used by default
SELECCIONAR_ARCHIVO_MOVIMIENTO: You must select a .csv file. Date format must be yyyy/mm/dd, example: 2015/06/28.
TIPO_CAMBIO_NO_ENCONTRADO: Exchange rate not found for selected currency
USUARIO_GUARDADO: The user has been successfully saved!!
USUARIO_INCORRECTO: The username or password is incorrect.
